about_the_game:
This content pack adds unique abilities when playing as Irish.

Beyond bringing a charming Irish brogue with you, your crew from the Emerald Isle brings the ability to make all kinds of smooth new whiskeys rarely seen in America. Then once your gambling operations start up, you can create a betting ring to bet on Gaelic Football. Your whiskey know-how will unlock a unique legacy goal at the end of Prohibition.

Features:
  • Add Irish national colors and symbols to your safehouse, crew markers and other parts of the game
  • Distill Blended Whiskey and Aged Whiskey, with the options to produce a new type of Moonshine, and a new way of bottling whiskey in multiple building operations
  • Bring Gaelic Football to your neighborhood with a unique set of missions
  • Unlock new clothing options and bring Irish fashion to your character portraits
  • Prosper through Prohibition with a new Legacy goal based on selling different Irish whiskeys

content_descriptors.notes: There are references to violence, crime, gambling, alcohol consumption and tobacco use.

detailed_description:
This content pack adds unique abilities when playing as Irish.

Beyond bringing a charming Irish brogue with you, your crew from the Emerald Isle brings the ability to make all kinds of smooth new whiskeys rarely seen in America. Then once your gambling operations start up, you can create a betting ring to bet on Gaelic Football. Your whiskey know-how will unlock a unique legacy goal at the end of Prohibition.

Features:
  • Add Irish national colors and symbols to your safehouse, crew markers and other parts of the game
  • Distill Blended Whiskey and Aged Whiskey, with the options to produce a new type of Moonshine, and a new way of bottling whiskey in multiple building operations
  • Bring Gaelic Football to your neighborhood with a unique set of missions
  • Unlock new clothing options and bring Irish fashion to your character portraits
  • Prosper through Prohibition with a new Legacy goal based on selling different Irish whiskeys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5/i7/i9 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 700 series or newer, AMD Radeon R5/R7/R9 200 series or newer, Intel Iris / HD 5000 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5/i7/i9 or AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 10 series or newer, AMD RX series or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
